Name: 东方有顶天梦 ~ The Top of The Dream
About the game: 'The Top of The Dream' is an TouHou style of barrage shooting game produced by the Top of The Legend Studios. Background of Game Story The monsters, the inhabitants, all dreamed of a place in the sky, and the immortals noticed the changes in their dreams. Troubled by the dream of the Reimu, after all alone to explore the sky...... Game mechanics In a dream, through the power of the dream, fire increases with wakefulness, but also decreases with drowsiness. When you're fully awake, you fire at full speed.If hit by a barrage, you will consume a lot of wakefulness and save yourself. Use part of the state value to open the boundary of the dream.At the border.If it is not shot during this time, it returns a portion of its cost and rewards it with a large number of points and eliminates ammo, and if it is hit, it triggers anti-ammo prematurely. The author's words The game is more for STG beginners, so if there is enough planning, the resources can be much more.While barrage is more powerful and difficult than most N's and H's, it's enough to break these epic runes if you understand and use the binding mechanism of anti-ammo, anti-ammo, and fire coverage perfectly.Hopefully it will give you some confidence and a sense of accomplishment as you get through very difficult levels and games.
